participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and nurturing, Emily enjoys spending time with her family and is passionate about teaching.
participant_1.background: I have a lot of fond memories of playing sports with my family and friends when I was younger. I prefer winter. I stopped by my local sushi bar on my way home from work to pick up a delicious meal. My favourite band is Rush. I spend a lot of time driving my kids to sports events.

participant_2.name: Ryan
participant_2.personality: Caring and adventurous, Ryan loves to travel and is dedicated to helping animals.
participant_2.background: I check on my mother first thing in the morning. Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling. I took a lot of pictures of my daughters last year. I am a boy. I'd brag about my ability to help animals and make them feel better.

content.text: I'm good thanks. I'm a teacher myself, and I love it. What do you do for work?
I work in the medical field, helping animals feel better.
That's awesome! I love animals too. I have two dogs and two cats of my own.
Nice! I have a dog and a cat as well.
What's your favorite thing to do in the winter?
I love to go skiing! What about you?
I love to go snowboarding! We should go together sometime.
That would be awesome! I'm free this weekend, if you are.
Sounds good to me! I'll message you my details.
